original_text: And when the Pharisees saw this, they said to his disciples, “Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners?”
korean_text: 바리새인들이 보고 그의 제자들에게 이르되 어찌하여 너희 선생은 세리와 죄인들과 함께 잡수시느냐

sentences.original_text: And when the Pharisees saw this,
“Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners?”
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들의 선생님은 어찌하여 세리들과 죄인들과 함께 먹습니까?
